turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hounddog's Three Degree Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need to look over the menu?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, give me a second.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Take your time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, I would like the Basil Pie Pizza. Instead of bacon though I would like to replace that with cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice choice.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and Instead of bacon though I would like to replace that with cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I believe that can be done for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size did you want to get it in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go with that one that is $18.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! Was there anything else you wanted from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't think so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you are ready for me to make the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, Your order for a Basil Pie Pizza with tomato instead of bacon is order and will be ready to pickup in 25 minutes. The total comes to $18.99. A receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are very welcome.
